Pre-Game Insights: The T20I series between India and the West Indies has exceeded expectations.
Both teams have been at their best and have played some entertaining cricket, providing supporters with hours of enjoyment.
The series is now 2-1 in favor of the hosts.
Rovman Powell-led team won the first two games, but India rallied in the third to keep the series alive.
